description.zh: PagePlug 是 Appsmith 的中国化项目，是一个开源的、声明式的、可视化的前端低代码框架，可以用来制作 web 应用、微信小程序。
description.en: PagePlug is the Chinese version of Appsmith's project. It is an open-source, declarative, and visual low-code front-end framework that can be used to create web applications and WeChat mini-programs.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势

- 基于 Appsmith 做了整体汉化及性能优化，体验变得更好了
- 更快捷简单的图表解决方案
- 集成表单解决方案领域的佼佼者
## 功能特色

- 更强大的可视化建模工具
- 更广泛的 API 支持
- 更完善的数据管理功能
- 更强大的扩展性
- 更好的安全性支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Based on Appsmith, with overall localization and performance optimization for a better user experience
- A faster and simpler charting solution
- A leader in integrated form solutions
# Features

- More powerful visual modeling tools
- Wider API support
- More comprehensive data management functions
- Greater scalability
- Better security support
